# spacing

**Instance Property**

The distance in points between the adjacent edges of the stack view’s arranged views.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var spacing: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defines a strict spacing between arranged views for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStackView/Distribution-swift.enum/fillProportionally] distributions. It represents the minimum spacing for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStackView/Distribution-swift.enum/equalSpacing] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStackView/Distribution-swift.enum/equalCentering] distributions. Use negative values to allow overlap. The default value is `0.0`.

## Configuring the layout

- **axis**: The axis along which the arranged views lay out.
- **alignment**: The alignment of the arranged subviews perpendicular to the stack view’s axis.
- **distribution**: The distribution of the arranged views along the stack view’s axis.
- **isBaselineRelativeArrangement**: A Boolean value that determines whether the vertical spacing between views is measured from their baselines.
- **isLayoutMarginsRelativeArrangement**: A Boolean value that determines whether the stack view lays out its arranged views relative to its layout margins.
